newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: TABLE - Vogels posts yr attrib profit.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - Vogels posts yr attrib profit.

text.p: Full name: Vogelstruisbult Metal Holdings Ltd
NOTE - As a result of a change in the company's reporting period from December 31 to June 30 last year, the comparative figures reflected in this report cover the six month period ended June 30 1996.

The company said headline earnings were stated after the exclusion of the amounts attributable to members in respect of surpluses on the realisation of strategic investments and amounts written off investments.
Earnings were boosted by substantially increased dividends from Zinc Corp of South Africa Ltd.
